UI_Scoreboard_Strings.MissingInAction_Tooltip: This player has abandoned the game and won't be spawned in until they return. Their team will receive compensation.

UI_Season.RankedRatingNeededText: 100 Rank Rating Points needed for rank up
UI_Season.ActRank_Description:
Act Ranks are a representation of your proven skill throughout an Act in Competitive - determined ultimately by your top nine Match Rank wins.

Your current and past Act Ranks will be displayed and tracked in your Match History. At the end of each Act, if you get at least nine Match Rank wins, you will earn a commemorative Act Rank Badge that will be displayed on your Player Card in Competitive games.
UI_Season.RankedRatingContinuationText: At Immortal and above, your Rank Rating Points will continue to accrue
UI_Season.PlacementsRequiredText: COMPLETE MATCH RANK PLACEMENTS TO ACTIVATE ACT RANK AND WIN TRACKING.
UI_Season.InfographButtonTooltip: Click here to show Act Rank information
UI_Season.FailedToLoad: Failed to find data for current Act
UI_Season.RecentGamesRequiredText: PLAY {number} MORE MATCH TO DISPLAY YOUR RANK AND START EARNING ACT RANK PROGRESS AGAIN
UI_Season.ActRank_TopTierDescription: The highest Match Rank you have won a Competitive game at for this Act.
UI_Season.PreviewRankButtonTooltip: This will display on your playercard in Competitive games once the Act is over.
UI_Season.ActRank_BackgroundDescription: Tracking your highest Match Rank wins. Once filled, higher wins will replace lower Match Rank wins
UI_Season.WinsRemainingForRank: WIN {number} MORE MATCHES TO DETERMINE YOUR ACT RANK
UI_Season.ActRank_BorderDescription: Your Act Rank border which evolves at 9, 25, 50, 75, 100 wins
UI_Season.ActRank_CurrentTierDescription: Your current proven skill for this Act

UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.VYE_Feature_ModeDesc: Chill with the new Snowball Fight mode to unlock your free Snowbro Gun Buddy before the event ends on December 29.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT2_Battlepass_Description: Climb the Battlepass and unlock exclusive weapon skins, Gun Buddies, sprays, and more.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.VYE_Feature_RankDesc: Climb the ranks to upgrade your EP1 Gun Buddy, based on your highest Act Rank achieved in E1 by Jan 11.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT3_Ranked_Description: Close out Episode 2 at the top. Show that you can stand with the best of them and track your pursuit on the leaderboard.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT2_Agent_Description: Control the battlefield and harness the cosmos as Astra.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.Feature_Battlepass_Description: Earn new & exclusive items in the improved Act III Battlepass, with revamped missions and a Variant-enabled skin line.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT1_Battlepass_Description: Fresh tiers of exclusive content to unlock, including three new weapon skinlines.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.VYE_Feature_RPDesc: Get 10 Radianite Points from Prime Gaming by linking your VALORANT & Amazon accounts now and claiming your reward on December 17.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.PrimePopupDescription:
Get Gun Buddies, Sprays, and more every month exclusively from Prime Gaming. That means you won’t be able to get these items elsewhere anytime soon.

Link your Amazon account now and unlock the "Lovebyte" Gun Buddy with Prime, and check back each month to earn fresh unlocks.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.VYE_Feature_MarketDesc: Grab discounted weapon skins at Night.Market, open for business on December 10.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.Feature_Deathmatch_Description: Harness nature to heal your allies and tear down your foes as Skye, joining the fight on 10/27.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT3_Forsaken_Description: Join the fallen. Collect Forsaken looks for the Operator, Classic, Spectre, Vandal, and melee.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT1_Competitive_Description: Precisely track your Ranked progress, compete on the Immortal+ leaderboard, and flex your rank with the EP 1 Gun Buddy.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT3_Breeze_Description: Save the views for later on this private paradise. Two sites surrounded by wide open spaces invite new tactics.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.Feature_Glitchpop_Description: Shatter expectations with the latest skins and accessories.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT2_Ranked_Description: Show the world your Radiant-level skills and track your progress on the in-game leaderboard.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.Feature_Ranked_Description: Showcase your skill with your Act Rank Badge and get more consistent matches with tightened matchmaking.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT1_Bundle_Description: Snag some of the top Episode 1 weapon skins with the Run It Back Bundle.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.Feature_Killjoy_Description: Take the fight to the tundra in the latest map, ICEBOX, now added to the rotation.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT1_Agent_Description: Tear holes in reality and infiltrate enemy territory with a mix of deception and aggression.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT2_Description: The updated Prime//2.0 skinline adds new looks for the Phantom, Odin, Frenzy, Bucky, and a flickable melee.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.PrimePopupHeadline:
UNLOCK EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME
ITEMS FROM <Purple>PRIME GAMING</>
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.EP2_ACT3_Battlepass_Description: Unlock Battlepass tiers filled with exclusive content, like skins and sprays, to look your best.
UI_SeasonalPopup_Strings.VYE_Subtitle02: WE'RE CLOSING OUT 2020 STRONG WITH VALORANT YEAR END. HERE'S A LOOK.

UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_ImproveClarity: A full-screen postprocess that increases contrast in midtones, giving you a more clear picture. This is a relatively expensive feature, but you will only notice a FPS hit if you are GPU bound. If you have a high-end GPU, we recommend keeping this on.
UI_Settings_Strings.RemoteInterpDelay_Tooltip: Additional buffering for other players' incoming network data.  Higher values can produce smoother movement for remote players by adding a small amount of latency.
UI_Settings_Strings.KeyBind_TogglePlayerLoadoutVisibility_De: Allows observers to bind a key for toggling the Player Loadouts Always Visible setting.
UI_Settings_Strings.Toggle_HRTF_Audio: Applies Head Related Transfer Function to 3D sounds. For most users this makes pinpointing sound easier. For some it may make audio sound "echoey".
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_HRTF_Audio: Applies Head Related Transfer Function to 3D sounds. For most users this makes pinpointing sound easier. For some it may make audio sound "echoey".
UI_Settings_Strings.TeamBasedCrosshairColor_Description: Changes crosshair color to respect the current team of the subject player when playing as an observer. Respects colorblind settings.
UI_Settings_Strings.ColorBlind_Tooltip: Changes the color of the highlight on enemy agents
UI_Settings_Strings.Privacy_SettingsMayNotApplyUntilNextMatc: Changing these settings may not take effect until your next match
UI_Settings_Strings.NewPlayerSettings_Desc: Confirm your preferences for communication with your party and teammates.
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_AllyAbilityAudioEnabled: Controls whether you can hear nearby allies equipping abilities
UI_Settings_Strings.Toggle_BombInWeaponCycle: Cycle to Next/Prev Weapon Includes Spike
UI_Settings_Strings.MouseWheelWrapsInventory: Cycle to Next/Prev Weapon Wraps Inventory
UI_Settings_Strings.Vignette_Description: Darkens corners of your screen to help you focus on the center of your screen. This has a small but noticeable GPU performance impact.
UI_Settings_Strings.Show_FramesPerSecond_Description: Display Frames Per Second on screen
UI_Settings_Strings.Distortion_Description: Distortion is used to create effects that appear to distort things behind them. Orbs, explosions, and some agent abilities use this. Turning this on will render that effect, at the cost of minor performance. There is no cost when no distortion is on-screen.
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_MouseLatencyOrFramerateOption: Do you prefer lower input latency or higher framerate?
UI_Settings_Strings.PartyVoiceForCustom_Tooltip:
Enable party voice during a custom game.
You'll be able speak to both spectators and the enemy team
during agent selection and during game.
UI_Settings_Strings.Shadows_Description: Enables dynamic cast shadows on first-person weapons and arms, as well as agents in agent select. Does not affect third-person characters or environments. Turning this feature off will improve performance on older graphics cards.
UI_Settings_Strings.MultithreadedRendering_Description:
Enables multithreaded rendering for better performance on powerful machines.
Provides largest benefit with a fast GPU and extra CPU cores.
UI_Settings_Strings.MatureContent_RestartRequired: Enabling Mature Content requires a restart to take effect.
UI_Settings_Strings.SettingsConnectionErrorMessage:
Error retrieving settings from server.
Changes to settings will not be saved to the server.
If this is your first time seeing this error, try restarting the game.
UI_Settings_Strings.Toggle_FadeCrosshairWithFiringError_Desc: Fade out the top crosshair line during extended fire
UI_Settings_Strings.SaveFailedError_Message: Failed to save settings to the server.
UI_Settings_Strings.ClientFrameRate_Description: Frames per second for the client.
UI_Settings_Strings.ServerFrameRate_Description: Frames per second for the server.
UI_Settings_Strings.ShowMatureContentTooltip: Globally enables or disables mature content. Changing this value may require a restart to take effect.
UI_Settings_Strings.Audio_HRTFEnable_Tooltip: HRTF provides better 3D spatialization of sounds by approximating an average head shape for the listener. Effect will be applied to footsteps, reloads, and respawns. Please disable any other 3D audio processing applications while using HRTF.
UI_Settings_Strings.NetworkBufferingDescription:
Helps with poor networking conditions including packet loss and ping spikes. 
This option will buffer additional incoming data to smooth out 3P player movement and reduce outgoing data to reduce load on your bandwidth.
This allows for smoother movement and reduced network load, at the cost of potential sub-second delays on movement and input.
UI_Settings_Strings.Privacy_AnonymizeSelf: Hide My Name from Players Outside My Party
UI_Settings_Strings.Keybind_ModifyObservePlayer: Hold to Observe Player in Free Camera
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_LanguageSelectionRestart: Language selection will be applied next time you restart the game.
UI_Settings_Strings.LimitFPSInBackgroundDescription: Limit framerate when game is in the background.
UI_Settings_Strings.MaxFPSInBackgroundDescription: Maximum framerate when the game is in the background.
UI_Settings_Strings.Crosshair_Alignment_Tooltip_Message:
Mixing even and odd numbered thicknesses - such as a 1px dot and 2px inner lines - will create visual misalignment.

Since displays have an even number of pixels (e.g. 1920x1080), and crosshairs are rendered pixel-perfect, odd thickness elements must be anchored slightly off visual center. Alignment of odd numbered thicknesses has no negative effect on accuracy. 

To avoid misalignment, be sure to use all even (2, 4, 6) or all odd (1, 3, 5) thickness elements.
UI_Settings_Strings.MuteMusicOnAppWindowDeactivate_label: Mute Music When Game Window Out Of Focus
UI_Settings_Strings.Privacy_RejectPartyInvitesByDisplayName: Only Allow Party Requests from Friends
UI_Settings_Strings.Description_PartyVoice: Only players you choose to party with will be able to talk with you in this channel. It is present during and outside of the match, and has no restrictions on how players choose to communicate.
UI_Settings_Strings.PartyPushToTalk: Party Voice Push To Talk Key
UI_Settings_Strings.CPUBoundPercentage_Description: Percentage of recent frames bound by the CPU.
UI_Settings_Strings.GPUBoundPercentage_Description: Percentage of recent frames bound by the GPU.
UI_Settings_Strings.AudioSpeakerConfig_Tooltip: Sets speaker configuration for audio output.
UI_Settings_Strings.ShowFullScreenBlind: Show Full Screen Blind for Observers
UI_Settings_Strings.Toggle_ShowCrosshairInSpectatorMode_Desc: Show Spectated Player's Crosshair instead of your own
UI_Settings_Strings.TeamColorAffectsHUD: Team Colors Affect HUD for Observers
UI_Settings_Strings.TeamPushToTalk: Team Voice Push To Talk Key
UI_Settings_Strings.TeamVoiceChat_Description: Team voice chat can only be activated using a push-to-talk (PTT) key.
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_VoiceOverAmount: The amount of VO played in-game
UI_Settings_Strings.AspectRatio_Description: The game view is constrained to be 16:9 - if your monitor is a different aspect, then you may choose between Letterboxing or Filling the screen (cutting off edges)
UI_Settings_Strings.VoiceOverLanguageTooltip: The voice-over language to use in game.
UI_Settings_Strings.Description_TeamVoice:
This channel is available to all members of your team and is provided to improve coordination. To reduce noise and ensure all comms are sent intentionally, players can only use push-to-talk modes here. We expect all participants to be respectful and practice empathy.  Players who are disruptive here will be removed from the VALORANT community.

To curate your voice experience, we encourage muting frustrating individuals, and reporting those who intentionally abuse or disrupt this privilege from the in-game settings menus. If you do not wish to participate in voice chat, it can also be disabled here or at any point in the settings menus.
UI_Settings_Strings.InputLatency_Description: Time contribution of CPU game latency and GPU render latency  to input latency.  Game to GPU Render complete latency is from the start of frame simulation to the end of GPU rendering for that frame.  Only accounts for latency from CPU and GPU processing time, not hardware latency.
UI_Settings_Strings.InputLatency_CPU_Description: Time contribution of CPU game latency to input latency.  Game latency is from the start of frame simulation to when the graphics driver finishes submitting work to the GPU.
UI_Settings_Strings.InputLatency_Description_GPU: Time contribution of GPU render latency to input latency.  Render latency is from the start ofthe render queue to when the GPUfinishes rendering. Effectively theGPU contribution to system latency.
UI_Settings_Strings.IdleFrameTime_Description: Time spent idle each frame due to a frame limiter.
UI_Settings_Strings.RHIFrameTime_Description:
Time spent in the Render Hardware Interface thread each frame.
The RHI thread is responsible for issuing commands to graphics hardware when multithreaded rendering is enabled.
UI_Settings_Strings.CPUFrameTime_Description:
Time spent in the game thread each frame.
The game thread is responsible for updating most parts of the game simulation (ex. processing inputs, moving, shooting).
UI_Settings_Strings.GPUFrameTime_Description:
Time spent in the render thread each frame.
The render thread is responsible for deciding what objects in the scene need to be rendered and issuing commands to graphics hardware (when multithreaded rendering is disabled).
UI_Settings_Strings.KeyBind_FollowPrev_Description: Tries to cycle to follow the next observer in a backwards direction. Puts the player in follow mode.
UI_Settings_Strings.KeyBind_FollowNext_Description: Tries to cycle to follow the next observer in a forward direction. Puts the player in follow mode.
UI_Settings_Strings.Privacy_AnonymizeMatchmadePlayers: Use Generic Names for Players Outside My Party
UI_Settings_Strings.TeamBasedCrosshairColor: Use Team Color for Crosshair Color
UI_Settings_Strings.NvidiaReflexLowLatencySetting_Descriptio: Used to configure NVIDIA Reflex Low Latency settings.  Disabled: Low Latency mode is disabled.  Enabled: Low Latency mode is now enabled and optimizing system latency.  Enabled + Boost: Low Latency mode is now enabled and optimizing system latency.  Additionally, GPU clock frequencies are kept high in CPU bound cases.  This increases GPU power consumption, so be careful especially on laptops.
UI_Settings_Strings.BloomOption_Description: Uses bloom to feather bright light across the screen to simulate perception of bright light. Turning this on will have bright objects appear more realistically (primarily weapons) at the cost of framerate. A constant cost.
UI_Settings_Strings.VerticalSync_Description: VSync synchronizes the game framerate with your monitor's refresh rate. Turning this on will reduce tearing, but decrease framerate.
UI_Settings_Strings.VoipDucksMusicVolume_Tooltip: When active, this feature lowers the music volume when team or party voice chat are audible.
UI_Settings_Strings.VoipDucksFlavorVO_Tooltip: When active, this feature lowers the volume for non-gameplay agent voiceover lines while team or party voice chat are audible.
UI_Settings_Strings.MuteMusicOnAppWindowDeactivate_tooltip: When active, this feature mutes music when the game window is not in focus.
UI_Settings_Strings.Toggle_ChatTacticalCallouts_Tooltip: When enabled, automatic tactical callouts will be displayed in chat.
UI_Settings_Strings.PlayerLoadoutsAlwaysVisible_Description: When enabled, the overhead player loadout UI will always be visible.  When disabled, that UI will be visible during pre-round and can be summoned by holding the 'Show Teammate Loadouts' key.
UI_Settings_Strings.KeyBind_ModifyObservePlayer_Description: When held while pressing an observe player key, enters the free cam at a predetermined location to view the player.
UI_Settings_Strings.KeyBind_CycleCinematicCams_Description: When pressed while holding Hold to Observe Player in Free Camera, cycles through all predetermined free cam locations.
UI_Settings_Strings.KeyBind_ProjectileFollow_Description:
When pressed, follow the most recent projectile launched by the currently observed player.  Press again 
to return to that player.  While held, camera will automatically attach to the next fired projectile.
UI_Settings_Strings.FirstPersonHandedness_Discription: Whether agent's when viewed in first person are right-handed or left-handed
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_LoopbackTest: While loopback test is on, you will be able to see the power your mic puts out on the Mic Sensitivity Threshold. Loopback will automatically be disabled when settings is closed.
UI_Settings_Strings.DialogText_KeepDisplaySettings:
Would you like to keep these display settings?

Reverting to previous settings in {0} seconds.
UI_Settings_Strings.VoiceMutedTooltip: You have been restricted from transmitting in team voice.
UI_Settings_Strings.VoiceMutedDatedTooltip: You will be able to use team voice again on {date}.

UI_Social_Strings.FriendRequestAutoRejectTooltip:

You may still send friend requests.
UI_Social_Strings.SystemMessage_PendingRequestExists: This player already has a pending friend request from you.

The party you tried to join does not actually exist. Weird! Better luck next time.
UI_Social_Strings.Error_PreviouslyKicked:
YOU GOT THE BOOT!
You were previously removed from this party. You cannot join again unless you are invited directly. Sorry!
UI_Social_Strings.SystemMessage_AlreadyFriend: You are already friends with this player.
UI_Social_Strings.System_Message_AddingYourself: You cannot add yourself as a friend!
UI_Social_Strings.SystemMessage_YourFriendsListFull: You have reached the max number of friends you can have on your list. Remove someone to add someone else.
UI_Social_Strings.SystemMessage_IncomingFriendRequestsFull: You have too many incoming friend requests and will be unable to add any more.
UI_Social_Strings.SystemMessage_OutgoingFriendRequestsFull: You have too many outgoing friend requests and will be unable to add any more.

Vampire_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP an ethereal, destructible eye. ACTIVATE to cast the eye a short distance forward. The eye will Nearsight all enemies who look at it.
Vampire_Strings.Description: Forged in the heart of Mexico, Reyna dominates single combat, popping off with each kill she scores. Her capability is only limited by her raw skill, making her sharply dependant on performance.
Vampire_Strings.Ability2_Description: INSTANTLY consume a nearby Soul Orb, becoming intangible for a short duration. If EMPRESS is active, also become invisible.
Vampire_Strings.Ultimate_Description: INSTANTLY enter a frenzy, increasing firing, equip and reload speed dramatically. Gain infinite charges of Soul Harvest abilities. When an enemy dies to Reyna, or dies within 3 seconds of taking damage from Reyna, the duration is renewed.
Vampire_Strings.Ability1_Description:
Soul Harvest: Enemies that die to Reyna, or die within 3 seconds of taking damage from Reyna, leave behind Soul Orbs that last 3 seconds.
Devour: INSTANTLY consume a nearby soul orb, rapidly healing for a short duration. Health gained through this skill exceeding 100 will decay over time. If EMPRESS is active, this skill will automatically cast and not consume the Soul Orb.

Voting_Strings.Surrender_Command_Description: Call a vote to surrender the game
Voting_Strings.VoteNotif_CoachesCannotVote: Coaches may not request votes of this type.
Voting_Strings.Surrender_VoteFailed: Surrender vote failed. The game will continue.

Voting_Strings.Vote_CommandAlreadyVoted: You have already participated in this vote.
Voting_Strings.VoteNotif_RateLimited: You have requested too many votes. Please wait a moment before requesting a new vote.
Voting_Strings.Surrender_InvalidTooEarly: You may only attempt a surrender vote from round 5 onwards.
Voting_Strings.Surrender_AllyTeamSurrendered: Your team has voted to surrender.
Voting_Strings.Surrender_InvalidAlreadyAttempted: Your team may only attempt to surrender once per half.
Voting_Strings.VoteNotif_Queued: Your vote has been queued. It will activate at the next available round start.

Wraith_Strings.Description: A phantom of a memory, Omen hunts in the shadows. He renders enemies blind, teleports across the field, then lets paranoia take hold as his foe scrambles to uncover where he might strike next.
Wraith_Strings.Prototype_Description_Teleport: An enigmatic shadow, Wraith covers the battlefield and darkness and can teleport to unexpected locations. When Wraith's waround, it's never certain if you're ever truly safe.
Wraith_Strings.Ability1_Description: EQUIP a blinding orb.  FIRE to throw it forward, briefly reducing the vision range and deafening all players it touches. This projectile can pass straight through walls.
Wraith_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a shadow orb, entering a phased world to place and target the orbs. PRESS the ability key to throw the shadow orb to the marked location, creating a long-lasting shadow sphere that blocks vision. HOLD FIRE while targeting to move the marker further away. HOLD SECONDARY FIRE while targeting to move the marker closer. PRESS RELOAD to toggle normal targeting view.
Wraith_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a shrouded step ability and see its range indicator. FIRE to begin a brief channel, then teleport to the marked location.
Wraith_Strings.Ultimate_Description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to begin teleporting to the selected location. While teleporting, Omen will appear as a Shade that can be destroyed by an enemy to cancel his teleport, or PRESS EQUIP for Omen to cancel his teleport.
Wraith_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description_Rank:
Rank 1: +1 Charge
Rank 2: +1 Charge
Rank 3: Cooldown (20)
Wraith_Strings.Ability2_Description_Rank:
Rank 1: +1 Charge
Rank 2: Cooldown (60)
Rank 3: Cooldown (20)
Wraith_Strings.Ability1_Tooltip:
Rank 1: Free Charge per Round
Rank 2:

Wushu_Strings.Ability_X_Description: EQUIP a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an opponent. FIRE to throw a single knife at your target. ALTERNATE FIRE to throw all remaining daggers at your target.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_Xalt_Description: EQUIP a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an opponent. FIRE to throw a single knife at your target. ALTERNATE FIRE to throw all remaining daggers at your target.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_P_Description: Holding the jump button while falling allows you to glide through the air.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_Q_Description: INSTANTLY propel Jett high into the air.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_E_Description: INSTANTLY propel Jett in the direction she is moving. If Jett is standing still, she will propel forward.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_4_Description: INSTANTLY throw a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud on impact with a surface. HOLD the ability key to curve the smoke in the direction of your crosshair.
Wushu_Strings.Description: Representing her home country of South Korea, Jett's agile and evasive fighting style lets her take risks no one else can. She runs circles around every skirmish, cutting enemies up before they even know what hit them.
